title: ASK ANDY:  Laser Focus vs. Serial Entrepreneurialism (and questions from Periscope), with Andy Frisella - MFQA6
description: Should you stay focused on one business--or start many of them? In this ASK ANDY episode of The MFCEO Project, Andy Frisella tackles that question, as well as questions from a live Periscope broadcast.  Joining him in the studio is his co-host Vaughn Kohler.
